invite.title: Invite friends
invite.ruleDescription: Invite friends to register and purchase membership, ##both parties## will receive additional membership time rewards.
invite.retailerRuleDescription: Invite friends to register and purchase membership, ##the invitee## will receive additional membership time rewards.

invite.generateInviteCodeFailedRetry: Failed to generate invitation code, please retry
invite.copyFailedPermission: Copy failed, please check clipboard permissions
invite.updateRemarkFailedRetry: Failed to update remark, please retry
invite.clickToCopyInviteContent: Click the area above to copy the complete invitation content, including download link, invitation code, and reward instructions
invite.inviteCodeDescription1: Each user can generate multiple invitation codes, codes are permanently valid
invite.inviteCodeDescription2: Each invitee can only be invited once
invite.loadFailed: Failed to load invitation code info, please retry.
invite.getInviteCodesFailed: Failed to get invitation code list
invite.retry: Failed to get invitation code list, please retry
invite.retailerCashbackExample: Example: User pays {{orderAmount}}, you get {{cashback}} cashback
invite.firstOrderOnlyDesc: You get cashback when the user makes their first payment
invite.allOrdersDesc: You get cashback every time the user makes a payment
invite.retailerCashbackTip: Cashback will automatically enter your wallet and can be withdrawn to your payment address anytime
invite.generateNewCodeTip: Use different invitation codes to track publishing channels
invite.expirationSecurityHint: Short-term share links are more secure in chats, automatically expiring to protect your privacy
